item.title: Storybook 8.0 Brings Major Performance Improvements
item.description:
Storybook 8.0 delivers significant performance improvements with faster startup times, better bundling, and improved developer experience. The new version includes React Server Components support and enhanced testing capabilities.

Related Links

  • Migration Guide to Storybook 8
  • Storybook Performance Best Practices
  • Design System Documentation Examples
